scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.watch-cluster: npm run cluster --prefix server & npm run client
scripts.test: npm test --prefix server && npm test --prefix client
scripts.deploy: add deploy script if you work on mac os & for windows just run build on client and copy paste the files to server
scripts.deploy-cluster: add deploy cluster script if you work on mac os & for windows run build on client and copy paste the files to server
